result.msg:
import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd.facets.FacetedLuceneRDD

import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd._

import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._

import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd.logging.Logging

cities: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [Country: string, City: string ... 5 more fields]

msg.data:
res2: cities.type = [Country: string, City: string ... 5 more fields]
res3: Long = 3173958

result.msg:
res25: cities.type = [Country: string, City: string ... 5 more fields]

res26: Long = 3173958

paragraphs.text:
val fieldName = "country"
val k = 10
val dfStart = System.currentTimeMillis()
val dfResults = cities.groupBy(fieldName).count().sort(desc("count")).take(k)
val dfEnd = System.currentTimeMillis()

val luceneRDD = FacetedLuceneRDD(cities.select(fieldName))
luceneRDD.cache()
luceneRDD.count()
val lucStart =System.currentTimeMillis()
luceneRDD.facetQuery("*:*", fieldName, facetNum = k)
val lucEnd =System.currentTimeMillis()


println("=" * 20)
println(s"DF time: ${ (dfEnd - dfStart) / 1000D } seconds")
println("=" * 20)
println(s"Lucene time: ${(lucEnd - lucStart) / 1000D} seconds")
println("=" * 20)
